geometry

Class Parallelepiped

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.Parallelepiped

  • public final class Parallelepiped
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a right-angled parallelepiped with integer-valued side lengths invariant [x/y/z]Size are always positive

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parallelepiped(Position corner)
      Creates a unit parallelepiped cornered at the given position
      Parallelepiped(Position corner, int xSize, int ySize, int zSize)
      Creates a parallelepiped with the given dimensions centered at the given position

      • Parallelepiped

        public Parallelepiped(Position corner,
                      int xSize,
                      int ySize,
                      int zSize)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a parallelepiped with the given dimensions centered at the given position
        Parameters:
        corner - minimal position of the parallelepiped
        xSize - x-dimension of the parallelepiped
        ySize - y-dimension of the parallelepiped
        zSize - z-dimension of the parallelepiped
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the dimensions are not positive

                                                                                Axis axis)
        Produce the neighbours whose corners lie on the given axis that passes through the center of this parallelepiped

      • fits

        public boolean fits(Axis axis,
                    Parallelepiped parallelepiped)
        Checks if given parallelepipeds can be combined into one parallelepiped based on whether their sizes match and whether their positions coincide
        Parameters:
        axis - axis that passes through both parallelepipeds
        parallelepiped - parallelepiped to check the fitness with
        Returns:
        true if the sizes of parallelepipeds match, false otherwise
